labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a User, I want to be able to view Restaurant location details so I could learn about the Restaurant and check its ratings

name: Successfully get all the feedbacks of a location in the order mentioned by a user by ratings

steps.name: When the user sends a GET request to the end point for "location-001" with "Service" and sort by "desc"
Then the status code should be 200
And all the objects key value pair should be non null
And the ratings should be in proper order "desc"
